Triggers.Description: When a Logical Disk Advanced trigger occurs on a specific scope matching a custom filter
Triggers.Filter: <FilterNodeDescriptor xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" Connective="0" Negation="0" IsCollection="true" IsRegex="false"><Childrens><FilterNodeDescriptor Connective="0" Negation="0" IsCollection="false" Expression="FreeSpacePercentage<=40" IsRegex="false"><Childrens /></FilterNodeDescriptor><FilterNodeDescriptor Connective="0" Negation="0" IsCollection="true" Expression="" IsRegex="false"><Childrens><FilterNodeDescriptor Connective="0" Negation="0" IsCollection="false" Expression="DiskName=C:\" IsRegex="false"><Childrens /></FilterNodeDescriptor><FilterNodeDescriptor Connective="1" Negation="0" IsCollection="false" Expression="DiskName=D:\" IsRegex="false"><Childrens /></FilterNodeDescriptor><FilterNodeDescriptor Connective="1" Negation="0" IsCollection="false" Expression="DiskName=M:\" IsRegex="false"><Childrens /></FilterNodeDescriptor></Childrens></FilterNodeDescriptor></Childrens></FilterNodeDescriptor>
